title: im honor lvl 0 with 2 out of 3 checkpoints.
body: do yall think its possible to reach honor level 2 before ranked season ends? because im not sure since honoring up takes an incredibly long time, so just let me know if its possible or not, so if its not i can stop wasting my time trying to climb in ranked. can an official rioter answer please?

replies.body:
I just don't know how you get up honor 0 in the first place. 

Low key, I don't think you got enough time to put into games to collect honor for level 2 by the end. The system is designed that you can attain level 5 from 2 from start of season, to end, even on little play time. That said, 0 requires you dig yourself out of that first, _then_ you can start leveling it again. Not sure how long that could take.
honor lvl 0 because i was punished late last year and was at 0 then when the season reset my honor didnt reset then i got a 10 game chat restriction earlier this year so thats how.
Okay, so why were you 0 last year???
yes, i got punished for something while still honor lvl 2 (when they first introduced honor system) and basically honor lvl 0 stuck with me all the way until now

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Y51rgYkg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-08-14T16:52:13.239+0000)
>
> honor lvl 0 because i was punished late last year and was at 0 then when the season reset my honor didnt reset then i got a 10 game chat restriction earlier this year so thats how.

Just so you know if you were below honor 2 when the honor reset you kept your honor level, only if you were above honor 2 did your honor level reset to 2, or 2,1 2,2 or 2,3
